markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Radiant Circuitry](/Feats.aspx?ID=2466) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). The light shuts off when you take this action again or are knocked [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
name: Radiant Circuitry
